AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ship engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: After an asteroid grazed the ship's hull, [PAWN_nameDef] worked alongside the ship's engineers to repair the breach. [PAWN_pronoun] was recognized for [PAWN_possessive] bravery and was allowed to become an official member of the ship's engineering staff.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: colony settler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: After being rescued, [PAWN_nameDef] wrote a bestselling book about [PAWN_possessive] experience. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to help found new colonies, relying on [PAWN_possessive] experience, and more importantly [PAWN_possessive] unshakeable bond with [PAWN_possessive] sibling.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hellfur
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: After [PAWN_nameDef] completed [PAWN_possessive] training, [PAWN_pronoun] became a hellfur -- one of only a few hundred supersoldiers trained in elite combat skills. [PAWN_pronoun] often went in solo to complete missions that would have otherwise taken an entire squad.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] is good at commanding, but only in a military context. Likewise, years of witnessing and creating untold amounts of bloodshed have had their toll on [PAWN_possessive] spirit.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: shipbound child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a research spaceship and spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood on it. [PAWN_pronoun] helped around in various areas on the ship.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] learned to feel most at home with the comforting hull around [PAWN_objective] on all sides.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: military cadet
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: A small number of kits are hand-selected to be inducted into the Fendran military and given extensive training and conditioning to become soldiers. [PAWN_nameDef] was one such kit. Discipline and loyalty were ingrained into [PAWN_possessive] mind at a young age.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: stranded child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] sibling were some of the last people on a desolate, war-torn world after the Fendran military withdrew and left them behind. [PAWN_pronoun] lived like this for almost a decade, scavenging what [PAWN_pronoun] could from the ruined cities.\n\nOne day, a patrol ship passed overhead. In the few seconds that [PAWN_pronoun] had, [PAWN_nameDef] fired the last rounds from [PAWN_possessive] flare gun to get its attention.
